lead_paragraph: Where his peers — from Kendrick Lamar to Kamasi Washington to YG to Madlib to Dr. Dre and beyond — have approached Los Angeles revivalism with narrow focus, he is an omnivore.
snippet: Where his peers — from Kendrick Lamar to Kamasi Washington to YG to Madlib to Dr. Dre and beyond — have approached Los Angeles revivalism with narrow focus, he is an omnivore.

headline.main: Review: On ‘Malibu’ Anderson .Paak Takes In All That His Surroundings Offer
headline.print_headline: Review: On ‘Malibu’ Anderson .Paak Takes In All That His Surroundings Offer

abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews album Malibu by rapper Anderson .Paak.
